Package org.red5.server.service.mp4.impl

Class MP4Service

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.service.BaseStreamableFileService
org.red5.server.service.mp4.impl.MP4Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStreamableFileService, IMP4Service
public class MP4Service extends BaseStreamableFileService implements IMP4Service
A MP4ServiceImpl sets up the service and hands out MP4 objects to its callers.
Author:
The Red5 Project, Paul Gregoire, (mondain@gmail.com)

    • getStreamableFile

      public IStreamableFile getStreamableFile(File file) throws IOException
      Return streamable file reference. For FLV files returned streamable file already has generated metadata injected.
      Specified by:

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      Streamable file resource
      Throws:
